    ViewUser

    public class EditUser
extends UserGUIAbstract
    Edit information of a user (Teacher/Student) such as full name, user name, and email.
    extends UserGUIAbstract class.
    Author:
    maint

      • readyToSendRequest

        protected boolean readyToSendRequest()
        Description copied from class: UserGUIAbstract
        Check pre-condition to send request to server.
        Used in AddUser, EditUser when click button "Add" or "Save".
        Overrides:
        readyToSendRequest in class UserGUIAbstract
        Returns:
        true if:
      • full name field is valid.
      • user name field is valid.
      • and email field is valid.
        else false.
